column4: Hi please help me to install libboost-phthon-1.42 under ubuntu 12.04
why do you need 1.42 specifically and not the version in 12.04 repositories/
you're positive that libboost-python-dev does not satisfy the requirement?
where did you get the package from?
pastebin exactly the error you recieved
and what command did you run to get that?
after cmak . and make package dpkg -i heekscnc.deb
ah, it's specific in CMakeLists.txt.  You should contact the author to see if that specific version of libboost-python is needed (1.40) or if you can use the version available in 12.04
is it ok to change the cmakelists.txt?
I don't know. This is why I tell you to contact the author :)
for info I change the cmakelists.txt and use the libboost-python-1.48 and it install and run with error for gnome menu
